lines.text: a rumor that had traveled thousands of miles. A rumor that persisted in spite of scoffing and ridicule. But there I was, the best animal hunter from America, hunting a boy. I felt I couldn't complain - I was being paid very well. And after all, money was the only important thing in my life.
At any rate, I left Ritan with one firm fact imprinted on my mind - money was not the most important thing in my life.
